name: Da Greatest Boat Race Of All Time 4
name_original: Da Greatest Boat Race Of All Time 4
description:
Very epic video game about racing boats

HOW TO PLAY:
- Shoot targets to accelerate your boat, and make it to the finish before the other guy

COMPATIBILITY NOTE:
I've noticed that on non-60Hz displays the game runs inconsistently, and if vsync can't be enabled the game is basically unplayable. This shouldn't affect most people but yeah I'm trying to fix it ASAP

EXTRAS:
Follow me on Twitter if you want to see less shitpost-y games: @KP_CFTSZ
